duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the day to day leadership over the activities of counter operations, warehousing, production, and route deliveries of a branch location.
Ensure efficiency and productivity of the branch location by devising and initiating work schedules of personnel.
Evaluate and monitor day to day activities to ensure cost-effective operation and make recommendations for necessary changes.
Ensure a safe and efficient working condition of the branch and all employees.
Ensure compliance by all assigned personnel to laws that govern the operation of the branch location operations.
Coordinate with other units of the region to solve operational or customer problems.
Ensure customers are given the highest level of service possible.
Ensure that the branch location is in good repair, clean, and neat.
Ensure that the proper Airgas Standard Operating Procedures (SOP's) are followed.
Coordinate efforts with Account Managers to more efficiently service existing and prospective customers.
Provide Account Managers with quotes and researched information for customer follow-up.
Process customer orders for Account Managers.
Directly supervise all assigned branch employees.
Carry out supervisory responsibilities in accordance with the organization's policies and applicable laws.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree (A.A.or A.S.) or equivalent from a two-year college or technical school; or three to five years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience
